page.title: 03MORE ABOUT SUTTON DISTRICT
page.content: Sutton is the other main district in our block. This area has a lot of new housing development in it, but also has some of the older buildings left. Sutton district is divided into areas, Sutton Heath, Sherdley,Sutton Manor, Sutton Junction and Sutton Leach. Our block covers Sutton Leach and a small part of Sherdley. Sutton was also only fields and farmhouses many years ago but now has an industrial estate and many new housing estates. Sutton Mill Dam is situated in Sutton Leach and has recently been renovated by the Groundwork Trust, more details of this will be given later in the pages. Sutton has an interesting old church called St. Nicholas'.
